attributes.action: Reduce the amount of plastic affecting the ocean and animals safety.
attributes.background: Plastic is affecting animals such as whales, they are animals at the top of the food chain therefore the flow of food is delayed.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

The Government is currently asking people for their views on how it could tackle this problem. You can find out more here: 

https://www.gov.uk/government/consultations/tackling-the-plastic-problem
